definition: lying away from the median and sagittal plane of a body, a pass to a receiver upfield from the passer
details:
adjective
- lying away from the median and sagittal plane of a body
= example: lying away from the median and sagittal plane of a body
- situated at or extending to the side
= example: situated at or extending to the side
= synonyms: sidelong
noun
- a pass to a receiver upfield from the passer
= synonyms: lateral pass
